title: Ticket #1855: Add $MAX_RETRIES macro for PRE and POST scripts
description: Add a $MAX_RETRIES macro that parallels $RETRY -- this way, for example, a POST script can tell whether it's on the last retry of a node without the number of retries being coded into the script itself.
